name: Classic Sport Driving
description:
Classic Sport Driving is an upcoming racing game directly inspired from great classics from the 80s and the 90s, like Outrun, Lotus Turbo Challenge, Jaguar XJ220, Crazy Cars (Lamborghini American Challenge).
We’d like to invite you to travel to far countries, with a strong felling of wildness, vast spaces, nature and freedom.

Classic Sport Driving is a racing lines game for racing lines lovers.
However, IA opponents will take care of messing up with ideal racing lines, and require some improvisation skills!

Dance with the road, bounce from curve to curve, and get you the record time!
